stencil.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a piece of plastic, metal, or paper in which designs or letters have been cut out, that you put over a surface and paint over, so that the design is left on the surface
stencil.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a design made on something using a stencil
stencil.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to make a design, letters etc using a stencil
